title: Step 49

challengeFiles.name: index
styles
script

tests.text: Your elemValue function should use an implicit return.
Your elemValue function should implicitly return an arrow function with a character parameter.
Your inner arrow function should use an implicit return.
Your inner arrow function should return the result of calling idToText() with character + num as the argument.

description: Use the same syntax as your addCharacters function to update your elemValue function. It should no longer declare inner, but should return the function implicitly.
